import React from 'react' import Footer from './Footer' import UserLeft from './UserLeft' import {useState} from 'react' function NutriSearch() { const[foodname,setFoodname]=useState('') const [message, setMessage] = useState('') function handleform(e){ e.preventDefault(); const formData={foodname} fetch('/api/foodsearch',{ method:'POST', headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body:JSON.stringify(formData) }).then((res)=>{return res.json()}).then((data)=>{ console.log(data); if (data.foodname) { setMessage("Loggedin Properly!") } else { setMessage('Wrong Credentials!') } }) } return ( <>
